article: Nobody hates housework more than I do. I know we should be  _  at home, but I tried  not to do  housework in the past. But now I find some ways of making it  _  . Maybe some of these  _  can also help you. Invite friends for dinner: Everyone likes to go to a  _  house. By  inviting  friends, you will like to do the housework. Music: I'm busy and I  _  have time to listen to music. So sometimes I turn on my CD player when working. You will find your work is done  _  you know it. Give yourself a  _  : Tell yourself you are going to see a movie after your housework. It can be easy and fun to  _  housework with parents, right?
